t: Trump complained to Bezos before Amazon said it scrapped idea to display tariff cost
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon founder Jeff Bezos has cozied up to President Donald Trump since the Republican won a second White House term.

s: November 20, 2024 - These new Alexa-enabled devices are designed to fit beautifully in your home, and make it easier to keep your day organized, your smart home connected, and your family entertained.

t: Amazon says displaying tariff cost 'not going to happen' after White House blowback
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon said Tuesday it considered displaying import charges on items sold via its site for ultradiscount items, but that the plan "was never approved and not going to happen."

t: White House calls Amazon's reported move to display tariff prices "a hostile and political act" - CBS News
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon said it had considered listing import charges on some products, but said the idea wasn't approved and won't happen.

t: Amazon Kindle - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - In 2004, Amazon founder and CEO Jeff Bezos instructed the company's employees to build the world's best electronic reader before Amazon's competitors could. Amazon originally used the codename Fiona for the device. Branding consultants Michael Cronan and Karin Hibma devised the Kindle name.

t: Amazon in White House crosshairs over report of displaying tariff costs | Reuters
s: April 29, 2025 - Amazon said on Tuesday its low-cost Haul unit had considered listing import charges for goods in light of new U.S. tariffs but denied looking at such a plan for its main website, after the White House accused it of a hostile political act.
